Package io.github.dfx81.bot

Class Command

java.lang.Object
io.github.dfx81.bot.Command
public class Command extends Object
Commands to be executed by the bot. All commands return a formatted message to be sent to the user.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public static String start()
      Run when the user starts interaction with the bot.
      Returns:
      The message to be sent to the user.

    • ping

      public static String ping(int startDate)
      A test command. Will respond with the time it takes to reply.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The timestamp of the received command message.
      Returns:
      The time taken to reply.

    • help

      public static String help(String args)
      The command to list the commands supported by the bot. Also provide extra info on each command if passed the name of the command.
      Parameters:
      args - The command to view the details of.
      Returns:
      The info about the command or the list of all commands.

    • info

      public static String info(String uid, DBManager db, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.replykeyboard.ReplyKeyboard keyboard)
      The command used to get the record of a student/supervisor.
      Parameters:
      uid - The matric no/staff no.
      db - The reference to the DatabaseManager.
      keyboard - The reference to the ReplyKeyboard to create a custom keyboard if needed.
      Returns:
      The record related to the id.

    • info

      public static String info(String pid, DBManager db)
      The overloaded version of the info command that accepts a project id instead. Returns a specific record if multiple records are available for the same id.
      Parameters:
      pid - The project id.
      db - The reference to the DatabaseManager.
      Returns:
      The specific record based on the project id.

    • list

      public static String[] list(String[] query, DBManager db, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.replykeyboard.ReplyKeyboard keyboard)
      The overloaded version of the info command that accepts a project id instead. Returns a specific record if multiple records are available for the same id.
      Parameters:
      query - The question asked the user and selected by them.
      db - The reference to the DatabaseManager.
      keyboard - The button to be selected.
      Returns:
      The specific response to the selected query.

    • testMultipleResponses

      public static String[] testMultipleResponses()
      To test different response.
      Returns:
      responses.

    • details

      public static String details()
      The command to get the details of the bot.
      Returns:
      The details of the bot.

    • about

      public static String about(DBManager db)
      The command to get the info about the bot.
      Parameters:
      db - The reference to the DatabaseManager.
      Returns:
      The info about the bot.

    • error

      public static String error(int code)
      Used to return errors.
      Parameters:
      code - The error code.
      Returns:
      The error message.
